entries.meaning: Something that uses the exact same model as something else, but has superficial differences such as textures.

verbs.description: reskin (third-person singular simple present reskins, present participle reskinning, simple past and past participle reskinned)

entries.meaning: To replace the skin of a motor vehicle, especially so as to market the same car under different brands
(computing) To change the skin, or visual appearance, of an application.
examples: The editor can be reskinned. In other words, the color scheme and look and feel of the buttons can be changed.
